page.title: 02BROWN & TAWSE
page.content: Brown and Tawse are the largest single industry in West Horndon. They are steel stockholders . They buy large quantities from the British Steel Corporation and sell it in small amounts. Brown and Tawse sell stainless steel bars, tubes, fittings valves and plates. They also sell mild steel. The difference is that mild steel rusts and stainless steel doesn't, because it has nickel and chrome added. Brown & Tawse are situated here because there were hangers here,and they had their own railway. Brown and Tawse employ 150 people. A few come from West Horndon. Most come from towns nearby. The firm has 28 lorries delivering and collecting. Other people work in the offices and the factory workers shape and cut the metal to the right sizes.
